quotes.quote: I got this powdered water -- now I don’t know what to add.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I am getting into abstract painting.  Real abstract -- no brush, no canvas, I just think about it.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I just went to an art museum where all of the art was done by children.  All the paintings were hung on refrigerators.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Boy, life takes a long time to live
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: A friend of mine is into Voodoo Acupuncture.  You don’t have to go. You’ll just be walking down the street and...  Ooohh, that’s much better.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I changed my headlights the other day. I put in strobe lights instead! Now when I drive at night, it looks like everyone else is standing still.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I had just received my degree in Calcium Anthropology—the study of milkmen.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: If you can’t hear me, it’s because I’m in parentheses
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: For my birthday I got a humidifier and a de-humidifier;  I put them in the same room and let them fight it out.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Yesterday I parked my car in a tow-away zone;  when I came back the entire area was missing.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I have a switch in my apartment.  It doesn’t do anything.  Every once in a while, I turn it on and off.  One day I got a call. it was from a woman in France. She said “Cut it out”.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: If toast always lands butter-side down, and cats always land on their feet, what happen if you strap toast on the back of a cat and drop it?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I invented the cordless extension cord
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I saw a sign at a gas station.  It said “help wanted”.  There was another sign below it that said “self service”.  So I hired myself.  Then I made myself the boss.  I gave myself a raise. I paid myself.  Then I quit.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: A cop stopped me for speeding.  He said, “Why were you going so fast?”  I said, “See this thing my foot is on? It’s called an accelerator.  When you push down on it, it sends more gas to the engine.  The whole car just takes right off.  And see this thing? This steers it”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Every so often, I like to go to the window, look up, and smile for a satellite picture.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: While I was gone, somebody rearranged on the furniture in my bedroom.  They put it in _exactly_ the same place it was. When I told my roommate, he said: Do I know you?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: When I have a kid, I want to buy one of those strollers for twins. Then put the kid in and run around, looking frantic.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: When he gets older, I’d tell him he used to have a brother, but he didn’t obey.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I had a friend who was a clown. When he died, all his friends went to the funeral in one car.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I spilled Spot Remover on my dog. Now he’s gone.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I want to get a tattoo of myself on my entire body only 2” taller.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I made wine out of raisins so I wouldn’t have to wait for it to age.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I woke up this morning and couldn’t find my socks, so I called information.  She said they were behind the couch.  She was right.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Right now I’m having amnesia and deja-vu at the same time. I think I’ve forgotten this before.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Sponges grow in the ocean. That *kills* me.  I wonder how much deeper they’d be if that didn’t happen.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I got pulled over by a cop, and he said, “do you know the speed limit here is 50 miles per hour?”. So I said, “oh, that’s OK, I’m not going that far”.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Someone sent me a postcard picture of the earth.  On the back it said, “Wish you were here.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: If you’re not part of the solution, you’re part of the precipitate.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: “Did you sleep well?”  “No, I made a couple of mistakes.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I hate it when my foot falls asleep during the day because that means it’s going to be up all night.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I used to work in a fire hydrant factory.  You couldn’t park anywhere near the place.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: What’s another word for Thesaurus?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: When I was crossing the border into Canada, they asked if I had any firearms with me.  I said, “Well, what do you need?”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I planted some bird seed.  A bird came up.  Now I don’t know what to feed it.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I went to the bank and asked to borrow a cup of money.  They said, “What for?”  I said, “I’m going to buy some sugar.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I was in the grocery store.  I saw a sign that said “pet supplies”.  So I did.  Then I went outside and saw a sign that said “compact cars”.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: In school, every period ends with a bell.  Every sentence ends with a period.  Every crime ends with a sentence.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I xeroxed a mirror.  Now I have an extra xerox machine.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: The Bermuda Triangle got tired of warm weather.  It moved to Alaska.  Now Santa Claus is missing.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I had some eyeglasses.  I was walking down the street when suddenly the prescription ran out.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I got food poisoning today.  I don’t know when I’ll use it.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I put my air conditioner in backwards.  It got cold outside. The weatherman on TV was confused.  “It was supposed to be hot today.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I was in the first submarine.  Instead of a periscope, they had a kaleidoscope.  “We’re surrounded.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: All the plants in my house are dead; I shot them last night. I was teasing them by watering them with ice cubes.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: My girlfriend does her nails with white-out.  When she’s asleep, I go over there and write misspelled words on them.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I went to a general store.  They wouldn’t let me buy anything specifically.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: It’s a good thing we have gravity or else when birds died they’d just stay right up there.  Hunters would be all confused.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I wrote a few children’s books ... not on purpose.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I wrote a song, but I can’t read music so I don’t know what it is. Every once in a while I’ll be listening to the radio and I say, “I think I might have written that.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: So, do you live around here often?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I love to go shopping.  I love to freak out salespeople.  They ask me if they can help me, and I say, “Have you got anything I’d like?” Then they ask me what size I need, and I say, “Extra medium.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I didn’t get a toy train like the other kids, I got a toy subway instead;  you couldn’t see anything but every now and then you’d hear this rumbling noise go by.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I was trying to daydream, but my mind kept wandering.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: There’s a pizza place near where I live that sells only slices; in the back you can see a guy tossing a triangle in the air.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I had to stop driving my car for a while. The tires got dizzy.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I saw a man with a wooden leg, and a real foot.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I replaced the headlights on my car with strobe lights. Now it looks like I’m the only one moving.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I’m writing a book.  I’ve got the page numbers done.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: My friend has a baby.  I’m recording all the noises he makes so later I can ask him what he meant.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I got my driver’s license photo taken out of focus on purpose.  Now when I get pulled over the cop looks at it [moving it nearer and farther, trying to see it clearly]... and says “Here, you can go.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: After they make styrofoam, what do they ship it in?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: My grandfather invented Cliff’s Notes. It all started back in 1912... well, to make a long story short...
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I saw a subliminal advertising executive, but only for a second.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I bought my brother some gift-wrap for Christmas. I took and to the Gift Wrap department and told them to wrap it, but in a different print so he would know when to stop unwrapping.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I bought a self learning record to learn spanish, I turned it on and went to sleep, the record got stuck, the next day I could only stutter in spanish.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I installed a skylight in my apartment... The people who live above me are furious!
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: One time a cop pulled me over for running a stop sign.  He said “Didn’t you see the stop sign.”  I said “Yeah, but I don’t believe everything I read.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I went to the eye doctor and found out I needed glasses for reading.  So, I got some flip-up contact lenses.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I have a hobby. I have the world’s largest collection of sea shells. I keep it scattered on beaches all over the world.  Maybe you’ve seen some of it...
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I got a new shadow. I had to get rid of the other one --  it wasn’t doing what I was doing.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: On the other hand, you have different fingers.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I went to a restaurant that serves “breakfast at any time”.  So I ordered French Toast during the Renaissance.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: My house is on the median strip of a highway.  You don’t really notice, except I have to leave the driveway doing 60 MPH.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Last year I went fishing with Salvador Dali.  He was using a dotted line.  He caught every other fish.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I bought a dog the other day.  I named him Stay.  It’s fun to call him:  “Come here, Stay!  Come here, Stay!”  He went insane.  Now he just ignores me and keeps typing.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: The other day, I was walking my dog around my building...  on the ledge.  Some people are afraid of heights.  Not me, I’m afraid of widths.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Why is the alphabet in that order?  Is it because of that song?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I filled out an application that said, “In Case Of Emergency Notify”.  I wrote “Doctor”...  What’s my mother going to do?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Yesterday I found out what doughnuts are for.  You put them on doughbolts.  They hold dough airplanes together.  For kids, they make erector sets out of play-dough.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: “24-hour banking? I haven’t got time for that.”
quotes.author: Steven Wright
